Uses of Class
org.joeftiger.jhelp.HelpOptionBuilder

  • Uses of HelpOptionBuilder in org.joeftiger.jhelp

    Methods in org.joeftiger.jhelp that return HelpOptionBuilder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    HelpOptionBuilder HelpOptionBuilder.addInvokes​(java.lang.String... invokes)
    Adds invoke aliases to the option.
    HelpOptionBuilder HelpOptionBuilder.addParameters​(java.lang.String... parameters)
    Adds parameters to the option.
    HelpOptionBuilder HelpOptionBuilder.setCallback​(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.String> callback)
    Sets the callback function for the option.
    HelpOptionBuilder HelpOptionBuilder.setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
    Sets the description for the option.
    HelpOptionBuilder HelpOptionBuilder.setParameterType​(java.lang.Class<?> type)
    Sets the parameter type to be displayed if no specific parameters need to be met.
